headline: Palantir's Road To Q1, Assessing The Risk/Reward After A Sharp Correction
summary: Despite the drawdown, Palantir remains a hold due to its high valuation among AI data software peers and a strong long-term moat. Read more on PLTR stock here.

headline: Datadog: A Correction Was Long Overdue, But The Question Is By How Much? (Upgrade)
summary: Datadog fell ~15% in a year amid growth slowdown and margin compression. See why I recommend waiting for a further price drop before buying in DDOG stock.
